snippet: A Massachusetts man is accused of smashing his large backpack into the face of a 74-year-old female security worker at Boston's Logan Airport....

headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Assaulting Airport Worker
headline.main: Man Charged With Assaulting Airport Worker

lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts man is accused of smashing his large backpack into the face of a 74-year-old female security worker at Boston's Logan Airport.
